event.title: Bristol Machine Learning #3
event.description:
Welcome to Bristol Machine Learning first proper meet-up, this time hosted by Dyson.

Talks:

- "Google's Cloud AutoML Overview" (Rich Riley, Candide)
- "Building Machine Learning in Kubernetes with Pachyderm" (Ettie Eyre, Cookpad)

Schedule:

18:30 Doors, Pizza and Drinks
19:00 Talks
20:30 Tidy up & Head to a local pub to continue the conversation

Due to security reasons in order to attend this event, please make sure you have your full name set in your Meetup profile!
